title: MD5  and SHA1 should no longer be provided on download pages
description:
As the subject says: SHA1 should no longer be provided on the download page as it is deprecated.

The download area already includes an SHA512 hash, so it's just a matter of fixing the links to use that.

comments.content: We have an open issue for this in the LUCENE bug tracker: LUCENE-8493. Closing as duplicate
comments.author: Jan Høydahl
